subject: Relaxation on Global Tender Enquiry (GTE) under Rule 161 (iv) of General Financial Rules (GFRs)s 2017 for procurement of raw materials - reg.
text: HRdy <2ty TTTANf xifearut 3M04 / Phone : 91-11-25074100/25074200 (sc WRaev 3k_{oTHTIf HTt4) 5qHT_ Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) v7-5 Uai 6, Wazr-10, ERGT, # farfl-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Misc./2022 Policy Circular No.18.80 dated 11th March, 2022 [Decision taken on e-office File No: NHAI/CMD/ Misc/2021/2 (Computer No: 99627)] Sub.: Relaxation on Global Tender Enquiry (GTE) under Rule 161 (iv) of General Financial Rules (GFRs)s 2017 for procurement of raw materials MoRTH vide Letter File No_ 6-20016/03/2020-TF-Il dated 21.02.2022 has forwarded a copy of Department of Expenditure's OM No. F.4/1/2021-PPD dated 14.02.2022 on the above subject: A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and compliance. 2  This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
